gen:link.msg:message: `EmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpenses` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_EmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_EmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpensesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpensesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpensesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfEmployeeBenefitsAndOtherAdministrativeExpensesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IncomeFromSecuritiesAndInvestmentsInParticipatingInterests` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit7_IncomeFromSecuritiesAndInvestmentsInParticipatingInterests')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit7_IncomeFromSecuritiesAndInvestmentsInParticipatingInterests return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit7_ChildrenOfIncomeFromSecuritiesAndInvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit7_ChildrenOfIncomeFromSecuritiesAndInvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit7_ChildrenOfIncomeFromSecuritiesAndInvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit7_ChildrenOfIncomeFromSecuritiesAndInvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de huidige periode) BEHOORT gerapporteerd te worden, omdat `NetResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de voorgaande periode) en `ResultAfterTax` (aan het einde van / gedurende de huidige periode) gerapporteerd worden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set01NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set01NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set02ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set02ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set03NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementBanks_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set03NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
